spec_data.Name: perl-Dist-Zilla-Plugin-Git-Contributors
spec_data.Description:
This is a Dist::Zilla plugin that extracts all names and email addresses
from git commits in your repository and adds them to the distribution
metadata under the x_contributors key.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:13:22 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Add contributor names from git to your distribution
